definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Chip set, graph acceleration system, motherboard and its controlling method.
sentences.chinese: 芯片組，圖形加速系統，主機板及其控制方法。

sentences.english: I consider the Asus Motherboard to be the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲華碩主機板是最好的地區之一。

sentences.english: I would like to ask, I support those parts of the motherboard.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲華碩主機板是最好的地區之一。

sentences.english: They added these circuit boards to the computer main board.
sentences.chinese: 他們將這些電路板加工成電腦的主機板。

sentences.english: Here's a wall of motherboards bearing the new chipsets on the desktop front.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的一整面牆的主機板軸承新的芯片在臺式機前。

sentences.english: Otherwise you could end up frying your modem and possibly the motherboard too.
sentences.chinese: 否則，你可能落得油炸你的主機板調制解調器和可能。

definition: Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]
pinyin: Shen1 zhen4 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: abbr. for 紐約證券交易所|纽约证券交易所[Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
to ask to buy/to bid for purchase
